name: email_renderer
description: make the reusableemail_renderer for charts here
author: rickotoole <rick@rockerbox.com> (http://rockerbox.com)

scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -u email_renderer -n email_renderer -o build/email_renderer.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/email_renderer.js -c -m -o build/email_renderer.min.js && rm -f build/email_renderer.zip && zip -j build/email_renderer.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/email_renderer.js build/email_renderer.min.js
